description:
## Horizontal Subgrid Registration

Register a horizontal subgrid - one stagger position of a computational grid.

Subgrids define which variables are calculated at specific grid locations.

Subgrid IDs follow format: s[NNN] (e.g., s100, s101)

label: Subgrid ID
description: Unique identifier for this subgrid.\n\nFormat: s[NNN] where NNN is a number.

label: Description
description: Description to distinguish this subgrid from similar ones.
placeholder: e.g., Mass variables on a regular latitude-longitude grid

label: Cell Variable Type
description:
Types of physical variables at this subgrid location.

- mass: Mass-related, thermodynamic, hydrodynamic quantities
- x-velocity: X component of velocity (longitude direction)
- y-velocity: Y component of velocity (latitude direction)
- velocity: Full velocity vector (for unstructured grids)

label: Horizontal Grid Cells
description: ID of the grid cells definition used by this subgrid.\n\nFormat: g[NNN] (e.g., g100)

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
